EmailTemplate.name: Reviewer Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerFirstName__c}, {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerLastName__c} has registered as Reviewer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification that the Reviewer {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerFirstName__c}, {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerLastName__c} has registered
This email is to notify you that {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerFirstName__c}, {!UserRegistration__c.ExternalReviewerLastName__c} has registered and made request to gain access to EGMS System.
Once you have affirmed approval for the Reviewer profile, an email with login credentials will be sent to the requesting applicant.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely
EGMS Team
